dataList.dlg: My seniors have already suffered them afore; trust them to guard your blind sides in moments of great import.
Lady Moses's breath shall be the key with which you overcome this trial... She must be protected at all costs!
A layer has been removed... Perhaps this shall make the blade deadlier.
Shimmering haze of fire along the weapon... Be wary of its searing heat!
... Indeed, it was no blunt weapon at all, but a bladed one. We witness the true form... of the sword.
Your foes are reeling from the harpoon! Now is your moment...!
Thus arrives the decisive moment. Betwixt the gap of absentmindedness shall invade their relentless assault...
The man's daughter prepares aught as well... Let vigilance guide your senses, and decide carefully.
The daughter's blade too, burns vermilion...!
Violet pulse... The foes shall become further emboldened.
The radiance of the empowering ink painted beneath their skin becomes more illuminated with every strike you land...
